third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Daniel is a clear favorite. If Doug surprises us, it will be a major upset.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Doug needs to top roll Daniel fast and finish quick to have a chance.

Daniel Procopciuc.previous_match_summary: Dominant in past matches, but lost to David Samushia after changing styles.

Doug Erlich.strength: Strong and a good arm wrestler.
Doug Erlich.previous_match_summary: Beat Raimonds Liepins easily, but Raimonds underestimated him.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Davit is insane and very dominant after his return.

Davit Samushia.previous_match_summary: Lost his first match back but has been dominant since.

Brandon Ellsessor.strength: Good, but unclear where he ranks against Davit.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Adam is very dedicated and smart. Bacho's lack of recent competition might be a disadvantage.

Bacho Saginashvili.strength: Unknown due to lack of recent competition.

Adam Wawrzynski.previous_match_summary: Impressive performances, including beating Borzder Simenov.
